product_name: The North Face Miss Kit Hoodie Jacket - Women's
long_description: The North Face Miss Kit Full-Zip hoodie jacket is insulated and warm, and so comfortable you'll be tempted to wear it everyday in brisk weather. Cotton/polyester fleece outer fabric is soft, comfy and easy care. Insulated with 60g of warm, lightweight Heatseeker(TM) polyester fiber-fill. Nylon taffeta lining slides on easily over a long-sleeve shirt. Center-front zipper is smoothly covered by a snap placket. Zip welted hand pockets. The North Face Miss Kit Full-Zip hoodie features an embroidered logo at left chest and back right shoulder.
short_description: The North Face Miss Kit Full-Zip hoodie jacket is insulated and warm, and so comfortable you'll be tempted to wear it everyday in brisk weather.
